Nerangs.ab: at̰ rātąm zaraϑuštrō tanuuascīt̰ xᵛax́iiā̊ uštanəm dadāitī pauruuatātəm manaŋhascā vaŋhə̄uš mazdāi š́iiaoϑanahiiā aṣ̌āi yācā uxδax́iiācā səraošəm xšaϑrəmcā pas ān hum va urvarān kufte andar guše-ye sang-e urvis nahādan vars andar hum pyāle gozāštan pas dast be-pādyāb bordan ān hum va ān urvarān ke be-dast-e čab nahāde ast āvardan hum-pyāle nahādan ān zur ke be-dast-e čab nahāde ast āvardan piš-e hum-pyāle nahādan pas qatre-ye šir andar ǧām-dān riḫtan az ān riḫtan az ān naguftim ānǧā imąmcā gąm jīuuiiąm čon šir nabud be-kār ne pas be-dast-e čab barsom ke andar māhruy nahāde gereftan ān kasi ke ḫᵛāhad kardan yaθā ahū vairiiō ḫᵛāndan dast be-pādyāvi bar-ā-bar ādošt be-istādan nəmastə ātarš mazdā̊ ahurahe huδā̊ mazišta yazata xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū frauuarāne gāh-e hāvan tauua ātarš puθra ahurahe mazdā̊ x. y. v. x. f. yaθā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā mē mrūtē ānkas ke dast andar barsom dārad aθā ratuš kardan dast-e čab ādošt šodan ādošt šostan aṣ̌əm vohū se ḫᵛāndan ādošt šostan az čab tā rāst va miyān-e ādošt šostan

"at̰ rātąm zaraϑuštrō tanuuascīt̰ xᵛax́iiā̊ uštanəm dadāitī pauruuatātəm manaŋhascā vaŋhə̄uš mazdāi š́iiaoϑanahiiā aṣ̌āi yācā uxδax́iiācā səraošəm xšaϑrəmcā. Thereafter, he should put the pounded hum and urwarām at the corner of the urvis-stone and put the vars inside the hum-cup. Then he should wash his hand with pādyāb and bring the hum and urvarān that were put to the left and put them in the hum-cup. Afterwards, he should bring and place next to the hum-cup. Then he should pour a drop of milk into the ǧāmdān. I have not described how to pour. Here it does not apply (the recitation of) imąmcā gąm jīuuiiąm, since there is no milk. Then, he should take the barsom that has been placed on the māhruy with the left hand. The one who wishes to perform (the liturgy) should recite a Yaθā ahū variiō, wash his hands and stand in front of ādošt (and recite) nəmastə ātarš mazdā̊ ahurahe huδā̊ mazišta yazata xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊, one Aṣ̌əm Vohū and the frauuarāne with the gāh-e hāvan (and the šnūman) tauua ātarš puθra ahurahe mazdā̊ x. y. v. x. f. (and with the wāz) yaθā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē."
tā u ʿe səraōšəm xšaθrəmcā be guyešn va pas farāhum andar farāhumdān konešn
"He has to recite until səraōšəm xšaθrəmcā and the he has to pour the farāhum into the farāhumdān."
